extendedInfo.description: Learn how to draw animals and more with these fantastic videos by eHow! The artist draws on a sheet of glass so you can clearly see everything as it happens. There's no better way for kids or adults to take the first steps towards bringing your imagination to life.â¢ All videos feature high production values and are shot in crystal clear high definition.â¢ Professional artists are the instructors, not paid actors.â¢ Clear, easy to understand instructions anyone can follow.â¢ Featured videos include:- How to Draw a Razorback- Step by Step Drawing a Macaroni Penguin- How to Draw Male Manga Hair- How to Draw Realistic Roses- How to Draw 3D Lowercase Graffiti Letters- How to Draw Strawberries- How to Draw the Human Skeleton Sideways- How to Draw a Family Tree Chart- How to Draw a Mountain-Looking Background- How to Draw Women's Collared Shirts- How to Draw a Realistic Broken Heart- How to Draw Martial Arts Figures- How to Draw a Portrait of a Boy- How to Draw a Broken Window Effect- How to Draw a Person at a Locker- How to Draw a River Bank Landscape- How to Draw a Truss Tooth Bridge
